description: nova-api init scripts for the debian packages does not create /var/log/nova/nova-api.log log file since I guess it's not like the other daemons using the twisted logging facilities (since using eventlet).
title: nova-api debian packages does not create /var/log/nova/nova-api.log

comments.content: nova-api init scripts for the debian packages does not create /var/log/nova/nova-api.log log file since I guess it's not like the other daemons using the twisted logging facilities (since using eventlet).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~chmouel

comments.content:
It's because use_syslog defaults to True. It means that unless a logfile is explicitly set, workers who deamonise through nova.server.daemonize() end up logging to syslog instead of a separate logfile. That default should probably be changed to match the behaviour of the other workers.

Setting a logfile explicitly is not cool, because that would require nova-api to have a separate flagfile.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren

comments.content: That was fixed by switching to paste, afaict
